content.para: This document outlines the rules governing data modules, extracted from the provided `dmodule` XML.
content.heading: Context Rules - Structure Object Rule Groups
content.para: The following rules are context-dependent and organized into rule groups.
content.heading: Structure Object Rule Group
content.para: This group defines permissible values for various attributes within the data module structure.
content.heading: Attribute Definitions & Permissible Values

item.definition: Defines the reason for updating the data module.
Defines the style of verbatim text.
Defines the unit of measure for quantity data. Values within the range `um51-um99` can be allocated and defined by projects or organizations. (Refer to Table 2 in document section 3.9.6.2)

content.heading: Non-Context Rules
content.para: These rules are not dependent on specific context within the data module.
content.heading: Deletion of Data Modules
content.para: Deletion of data modules is treated as a special case of update. The data module itself is not physically deleted but is marked as deleted. (Refer to document section 3.9.5.1, Para 2.2)
